Package me.agno.gridjavacore.filtering.types

Class SqlDateFilterType<T>

java.lang.Object
me.agno.gridjavacore.filtering.types.FilterTypeBase<T,Date>
me.agno.gridjavacore.filtering.types.SqlDateFilterType<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFilterType<T,Date>
public class SqlDateFilterType<T> extends FilterTypeBase<T,Date>
SqlDateFilterType is a class that represents a custom filter type for filtering dates in SQL queries.

  • Method Details

    • getValidType

      public GridFilterType getValidType(GridFilterType type)
      Returns the valid GridFilterType based on the input GridFilterType.
      Specified by:
      getValidType in interface IFilterType<T,Date>
      Specified by:
      getValidType in class FilterTypeBase<T,Date>
      Parameters:
      type - The input GridFilterType.
      Returns:
      The valid GridFilterType. If the input type is a valid GridFilterType, it is returned as is. Otherwise, GridFilterType.EQUALS is returned.

    • getTypedValue

      Specified by:
      getTypedValue in interface IFilterType<T,Date>
      Specified by:
      getTypedValue in class FilterTypeBase<T,Date>
      Parameters:
      value - The string value to parse into a typed value.
      Returns:
      The typed value retrieved from the string value, or null if parsing fails.

    • getFilterExpression

      public jakarta.persistence.criteria.Predicate getFilterExpression(jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder cb, jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaQuery<T> cq, jakarta.persistence.criteria.Root<T> root, org.hibernate.query.sqm.tree.select.SqmQuerySpec source, String expression, String value, GridFilterType filterType, String removeDiacritics)
      Retrieves the filter expression based on the given criteria objects and parameters.
      Parameters:
      cb - The CriteriaBuilder object.
      cq - The CriteriaQuery object.
      root - The Root object.
      source - The SqmQuerySpec object.
      expression - The filter expression.
      value - The filter value.
      filterType - The GridFilterType.
      removeDiacritics - Whether to remove diacritics from the filter value.
      Returns:
      The Predicate representing the filter expression.
